text: A Christmas Carol is a 2009 American 3D computer-animated fantasy comedy-drama Christmas movie. It was directed and written by Robert Zemeckis. It stars Jim Carrey, Gary Oldman, Colin Firth, Bob Hoskins, Robin Wright and Cary Elwes. The movie was released on November 6, 2009. It was based on the Charles Dickens book A Christmas Carol. Roger Ebert gave it 4/4 stars.https://www.rogerebert.com/reviews/disneys-a-christmas-carol-2009 == References == Category:2009 animated movies Category:2009 3D movies Category:2009 comedy-drama movies Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:Christmas movies Category:Disney animated movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies based on books by Charles Dickens Category:Movies directed by Robert Zemeckis Category:2000s comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:Movies about old age Category:2000s fantasy-comedy movies Category:American ghost movies
